channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-7547] Fix findbugs warnings in snapshot classes
item.description: Fix findbugs warnings introduced by snapshot code
item.summary: Fix findbugs warnings in snapshot classes

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
findbugs discovered some real bugs.

e.g. in ReferenceServerWALsTask.call(), we checked serverLogs against null but didn't return from the method.

Please review the patch.

All snapshot related tests passed with patch:


Running org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestRestoreSnapshotFromClient

Running org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot.TestSnapshotTask

Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 0.424 sec

+1.

I initially thought the \n -> %n was wrong but here's a link to an explanation. nifty.
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1883345/whats-up-with-javas-n-in-printf

It is also buried in the docs here under "line separator" http://docs.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/util/Formatter.html#syntax

nice!


     FileStatus[] serverLogs = FSUtils.listStatus(fs, logDir, null);

-    if (serverLogs == null) LOG.info("No logs for server directory:" + logDir

-        + ", done referencing files.");

+    if (serverLogs == null) {

+      LOG.debug("No logs for server directory:" + logDir + ", done referencing files.");

+      return null;

+    }

Integrated to snapshots branch

Thanks for the review, Jon and Matteo
